html:
In order to strengthen and bring health services closer to the entire Amazon population, the regional director of health of Amazonas, El?as Boh?rquez Medina, signed an inter-institutional cooperation agreement with the district municipality of Yambrasbamba, represented by its mayor Jos? Hern?ndez Zelada, to the implementation of the health post in the San Jos? annex.

As part of this agreement, the local municipality undertakes to hire health personnel for the health establishment, while the regional health department will be in charge of training and supervising its functions in order to meet the objectives established in agreement.

Similarly, the regional health director El?as Boh?rquez stated that he will order the implementation with medical equipment and essential drugs for the level of care of the establishment.

By the end of this month of December, the first delivery of goods and supplies will be made for this health establishment that will allow access to health services to the population of this part of the region.
